title: JavaScript Basics Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of JavaScript fundamentals

questions.question: Which keyword should you use for a variable that won't change?
questions.explanation: Declares constants that cannot be reassigned.

questions.question: What is the correct way to print something to the console?
questions.explanation: console.log() is the standard output method.

questions.question: What will typeof 42 return?
questions.explanation: typeof returns the data type as a string.

questions.question: Which operator is used for string concatenation?
questions.explanation: The plus operator joins strings in JavaScript.
